DOC.brief_summary: The purpose clinical trial collect image data embryo follow blastocyst stage ( Day 5-6 ) ongoing development validation Eeva System .
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose clinical trial collect image data embryo follow blastocyst stage ( Day 5-6 ) ongoing development validation Eeva System . Primary Objectives Include : To collect image data embryo follow blastocyst stage ( Day 5-6 ) Secondary Objectives Include : To collect enrollment data : demographic , IVF pregnancy history To collect Day 3 , Day 5 Day 6 embryo morphology data To collect pregnancy test outcome data To collect pre-implantation genetic screening ( PGS ) data ( applicable ) To collect Frozen Embryo Transfer ( FET ) data ( applicable )
DOC.criteria: At least 18 year age Women undergo vitro fertilization treatment use egg Fresh Frozen Blastocyst ( Day 56 ) transfer At least 5 diploid ( 2PN ) embryo fertilization check Willing 2PN embryo image Eeva Willing comply study protocol procedure Willing provide write informed consent Freezeall due ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ( OHSS ) Use donor egg / gestational carrier Fertilization use surgically remove sperm History cancer Assisted Hatching ( AH ) Day 3
